: : Kup : :
Kup: Fine Cam, I didn't mean anything by it, but... Energon?! These cubes are a special kind of energon, powerful enough to blow up the planet? Oh boy...
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Cam::

Anger shows on her face. "I am not a kid. I happen to be a great bot. 
I can fight with the rest of you. I just happen to have the energon 
cubes to blow up  the planet if used right. And..." her optics grew 
big as she realized what she had just said.  She slapped her hands 
over her mouth and looked at Kup in fear.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup puts his face in his hands.
> Kup: Kids. Windlord, would you?
